title: Drag and Drop Controls
description: Complete this task to gain familiarity with the drag and drop controls.
subtasks: Drag and drop this task to the GO column.

title: Creating Tasks
description: Complete this task to gain familiarity with the task creation process.
subtasks: Move this task to the GO column.
Activate the task creation dialogue by clicking the plus button inside the INBOX column.
Add a couple of subtasks to the task.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Editing Tasks
description: Complete this task to gain familiarity with the edit task process.
subtasks: Move this task to the GO column.
Activate the edit task dialogue by right-clicking the task you just created, and then clicking EDIT.
Edit the details of the task — edit its title and description. Add and remove subtasks from it.
You know what to do with this task. :)
